exceptions.exn: In environment sigma_sum_split : forall (i n : nat) (f : nat -> nat), i < n -> ∑ (S n) f = f i + f n + ∑ i f + ∑ (n - S i) (fun j : nat => f (S i + j)) sum_permutation_1 : forall (n i j : nat) (g f : nat -> nat), i < j < n -> g i = j -> g j = i -> (forall k : nat, k <> i -> k <> j -> k < n -> g k = k) -> ∑ n f = ∑ n (fun i0 : nat => f (g i0)) flat := fun (n : nat) (f : nat -> nat) (i : nat) => if le_lt_dec n i then n else f i : nat -> (nat -> nat) -> nat -> nat flat_left : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> nat) (i : nat), i < n -> flat n f i = f i flat_right : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> nat) (i : nat), n <= i -> flat n f i = n n, i, j : nat g, f : nat -> nat H : bounded_permut n i j g H1 : i < n H2 : j < n H3 : g i = j H4 : g j = i H5 : forall k : nat, k <> i -> k <> j -> k < n -> g k = k Unable to unify "i < n" with "i < j < n".
